definition: {"id":"mesh-lc001","family":"mesh-device-lc","endpoints":[{"type":{"id":"device","caption_en":"Device","description_en":"Device Period","caption_zh":"最大报告时间","description_zh":"最大报告时间周期","firm_type":"uint48"},{"id":"advertise_mode","type":"control","picklist_type":"advertise_mode","default":"whisper","caption_en":"Advertise Mode","description_en":"How often to broadcast identity","caption_zh":"广播模式","description_zh":"多频繁地广播标识","firm_type":"advertise_mode_t"},{"id":"min_ramp_time","type":"control","unit_type":"millisecond","default":0,"caption_en":"Minimum Ramp inside device","caption_zh":"内部温度","description_zh":"设备内部温度","delta":0.5,"firm_type":"float32"},{"id":"primary_volts","type":"metrics","unit_type":"volt","caption_en":"Input Voltage","description_en":"Primary Input Voltage","caption_zh":"输入电压","description_zh":"主输入电压","delta":0.5,"firm_type":"float32"},{"id":"ambient_lux","type":"metrics","unit_type":"lux","caption_en":"Light Level","description_en":"Ambient Light-Level","caption_zh":"相对光强","description_zh":"环境相对光强（百分比）","delta":0.5,"firm_type":"float32"}]}},{"type":{"id":"front","caption_en":"Front Panel","description_en":"Front-Panel controls","caption_zh":"前面板","description_zh":"前面板控制","registers":[{"id":"front_brightness","type":"control","unit_type":"relative_light","default":50,"caption_en":"Brightness","description_en":"Front panel brightness","caption_zh":"亮度","description_zh":"前面板亮度","firm_type":"float32"},{"id":"front_dim","type":"control","primitive_type":"boolean","default":true,"caption_en":"Auto-Dim","description_en":"Front Current","caption_zh":"电流","description_zh":"通道-{{index}} 电流","delta":0.1,"firm_type":"float32"},{"base":"fault","id":"ch{{index}}_{{base}}","default":"none","type":"metrics","picklist_type":"channel_fault","caption_en":"Fault Status","description_en":"Channel-{{index}} Fault Status","caption_zh":"故障状态","description_zh":"通道-{{index}} 水平","firm_type":"float32"},{"base":"enable","id":"ch{{index}}_{{base}}","default":true,"type":"control","primitive_type":"boolean","caption_en":"Enable","description_en":"Channel-{{index}} Enable","caption_zh":"开启状态","description_zh":"通道-{{index}} 开启状态","firm_type":"boolean"},{"base":"fullscale","id":"ch{{index}}_{{base}}","default":100,"type":"control","primitive_type":"percent","caption_en":"Full Scale","description_en":"Channel-{{index}}
